item.title: SWN
item.description: score:-279 Chances: Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases aid Southwestern’s (SWN) Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports. Chesapeake Energy and Cherniere Energy stand to gain. SWN Announces 2023 Earnings with Strong Cash Flow Despite Lower Commodity Prices.
